website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe fish fillet cleaning and hunting table that comes with everything you need.
pros: Made of durable polyethylene that holds up well to weather, sun, and saltwater
Can be rotated vertically so it's out of the way when not in use
FDA approved for food safety standards
cons: Not portable like some of our other top picks

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the $. I like that it can rotate and I can change the angle if needed. It comes with screws to mount but you really should get your own 1/4-20 bolts and bolt it to the dock. Use Fender washes on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: David Ditch

customer_reviews.title: If you catch fish, you need this table when you get dockside.
customer_reviews.text: My husband fishes with a man who has one of these cleaning stations. They catch so many fish that one station just isn't enough. We purchased a second station as a present! The comment by David D. about using 1/4 x 20 bolts instead of screws is a great suggestion and will be put to use.
customer_reviews.author: JHC

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice table. Well built. Almost made my own but glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wortner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent fish cleaning station. I have it attached to my dock which also has a garden hose for cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: LWR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my pier. Bolted to pier just waiting to fish. Great size for cleaning fish. Love all the cutouts for knives & hose
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Zolman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks and works great. Exactly what they say it is.
customer_reviews.author: grace grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the 5 star reviews and am VERY glad I did. Quarter-20 through bolted did the trick on the dock.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Edgell

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Similar starboard options were much more expensive and couldn't be any better. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly as advertised this is a perfect addition to our boat dock
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lake Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! Attractive and versatile. The fold down option is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Love the tilt feature. Fits well on my dock.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Magma Products, T10-449B-HDP 48" Tournament Series Dock Cleaning Station
product_meta.description: Magma's 48" tournament Series dock cleaning station has an attractive new look, black! this new color core material has thin white cap layers and a bright black center. Our "Magma" logo and handy new ruler has been engraved to show the black core for a clean look while increasing visibility when measuring the days catch. Not just designed for bait preparation or fish cleaning these tables are FDA approved for food preparation and service. Constructed with the finest commercial quality UV stabilized compression molded high-density polyethylene that is virtually indestructible, practical, and more sanitary than wood filet tables. These tables will not crack, peel, mildew, absorb bacteria or fish odors, allowing you virtually maintenance free use. Equipped with (4) filet knife holders and (2) handy receptacles for pliers or hook removal tools. The edges/corners are rounded for safety, and the new side channels with the slotted table back create proper drainage from the work surface while keeping your dock clean of scales and residue when preparing, cleaning, or filleting. The dock cleaning station comes equipped with a 1-1/2" tubular stainless steel base, for mounting to a dock or any flat surface, and (3) 1-1/2" round rail mounting brackets. The mounting brackets use quick release knobs for instantaneous adjustment or storage; constructed of 18-9 stainless steel with 356 hard anodized aluminum, to withstand the harsh marine environment. With its size and stability this cleaning station is the perfect addition for any fisherman that requires a full size working station on-shore (filet knives, pliers, and accessories not included) (side station and cover sold separately).
feature_bullets: 100% UV stabilized compression molded high-density color core polyethylene
Dock/deck mounted railing constructed of 1-1/2" dia. 18-8 mirror Polished stainless steel tubing with hard anodized aluminum hardware
Table rotates vertically flat on railing when not in Use or easily removed for convenient storage
FDA approved for food preperation and service; will not crack peel, mildew, absorb bacteria, or fish odors
Grooved sides and slotted table back for overboard drainage with a handy engraved ruler for measuring the days catch
